text: "Every Rose Has Its Thorn" is the third single off of American rock band Poison's second studio album Open Up and Say... Ahh!. The song was released on October 12, 1988. The song was able to make it to #1 on the Billboard Hot 100 and was certified Gold by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). The song is about a rock star coming home after touring and finding his girlfriend cheating on him. Lead singer Bret Michaels said he wrote the song after he called his girlfriend and heard another man's voice in the background. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1988 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs Category:Rock ballads Category:Poison (band) songs Category:Miley Cyrus songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Acoustic rock songs
